docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Jan. 16 (AP) -- The United States, represented by an Air Force All-Star team, defeated Argentina tonight, 87 -- 73, at Concepcion in a first-round game in the world amateur basketball championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Jan. 16 (AP) -- The United States, represented by an Air Force All-Star team, defeated Argentina tonight, 87 -- 73, at Concepcion in a first-round game in the world amateur basketball championship.

headline.main: U. S. FIVE WINS, 87-73; Defender Defeats Argentina as World Event Opens

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO -- South America is greeting this winter's tourist incursions from the north with new ships, new planes, new hotels, new roads and, in many instances, with attractively low prices.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO -- South America is greeting this winter's tourist incursions from the north with new ships, new planes, new hotels, new roads and, in many instances, with attractively low prices.

headline.main: BY AIR AND SEA TO SOUTH AMERICA

docs.snippet: ALMOST any subject, approached from the vantage points of separate disciplines, may yield insights not discernible otherwise. Here we have two books on Latin America, written by exponents of two disciplines, that of the historian and that of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: ALMOST any subject, approached from the vantage points of separate disciplines, may yield insights not discernible otherwise. Here we have two books on Latin America, written by exponents of two disciplines, that of the historian and that of the missionary priest, both concerned with the development, spiritual and material of that vast area south of the Rio Bravo.
docs.abstract: Johnson, J J: Political Change in Latin America. The Emergence of the Middle Sectors

headline.main: South of the Border, Change and More to Come; POLITICAL CHANGE IN LATIN AMERICA. The Emergence of the Middle Sectors. By John J. Johnson. 272 pp. Stanford: Stanford University Press. $5.

docs.snippet: The scene was a building in Santiago de Cuba. A revolutionary military tribunal composed of Fidel Castro's bearded guerrilla fighters sat in judgment of a former aide of deposed dictator General Fulgencio Batista. Spectators crowded the makeshift...
docs.lead_paragraph: The scene was a building in Santiago de Cuba. A revolutionary military tribunal composed of Fidel Castro's bearded guerrilla fighters sat in judgment of a former aide of deposed dictator General Fulgencio Batista. Spectators crowded the makeshift courtroom.

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Jan. 18 (AP) -- The United States completed its sweep through the preliminary round of the world basketball championship tonight with a 103-58 decision over the United Arab Republics. But in a major upset the Soviet Union lost to...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Jan. 18 (AP) -- The United States completed its sweep through the preliminary round of the world basketball championship tonight with a 103-58 decision over the United Arab Republics. But in a major upset the Soviet Union lost to Canada, 63 -- 54.

headline.main: U. S. FIVE IS VICTOR OVER ARABS, 103-58; Gains Third Straight Victory in World Championship -- Soviet Team Upset

docs.snippet: TAMPA, Fla., Jan. 18 (AP) -- Ruth Jessen of Seattle shot a three-over-par 76 today and won the $7,500 Tampa women's open golf championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: TAMPA, Fla., Jan. 18 (AP) -- Ruth Jessen of Seattle shot a three-over-par 76 today and won the $7,500 Tampa women's open golf championship.

headline.main: RUTH JESSEN'S 301 IS BEST AT TAMPA; Seattle Golfer Has a Final 76 in Open Event -- Mary Faulk Second at 307
